Methods in raytracer.render that return Scenery

Methods in raytracer.render with parameters of type Scenery
 void Camera.renderColorOf1stHit(Scenery s, java.awt.image.BufferedImage img)
          Renders an image by setting each pixel value to the color of the first intersected object.
 void Camera.renderDepth(Scenery s, java.awt.image.BufferedImage img)
          Renders an image by setting each to a grey value representing the distance of the first intersection to the camera.
 void Camera.renderImage(Scenery s, java.awt.image.BufferedImage img)
          Renders an image of a scene via raytracing.
 void Camera.renderNormals(Scenery s, java.awt.image.BufferedImage img)
          Renders an image by setting the color value of each pixel according to the normal at the first intersection.
